mapper.select: SELECT camp_no,camp_name,image1,num FROM (SELECT camp_no,camp_name,image1,rownum as num FROM (SELECT camp_no,camp_name,image1 FROM camp ORDER BY camp_no ASC)) WHERE num BETWEEN #{start} AND #{end}
SELECT camp_no,camp_name,camp_price,image1,rownum FROM (SELECT camp_no,camp_name,camp_price,image1 FROM camp ORDER BY camp_no DESC) WHERE rownum<=12

SELECT camp_no,camp_name,image1,camp_addr,camp_price,rownum FROM (SELECT camp_no,camp_name,image1,camp_addr,camp_price FROM camp WHERE camp_addr LIKE '%'||#{ss}||'%' ORDER BY camp_no ASC) WHERE rownum<=6

SELECT camp_no,camp_name,image1,num FROM (SELECT camp_no,camp_name,image1,rownum as num FROM (SELECT camp_no,camp_name,image1 FROM camp WHERE camp_addr LIKE '%'||#{a}||'%')) WHERE num BETWEEN #{start} AND #{end}

SELECT camp_no,camp_name,image1,num FROM (SELECT camp_no,camp_name,image1,rownum as num FROM (SELECT camp_no,camp_name,image1 FROM camp WHERE camp_animal='y' ORDER BY camp_no ASC)) WHERE num BETWEEN #{start} AND #{end}
SELECT CEIL(COUNT(*)/12.0) FROM camp WHERE camp_animal='y'
SELECT rdays FROM camp WHERE camp_no=#{camp_no}
SELECT time FROM reserve_date WHERE dno=#{dno}
